entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
